subsection_content:
Proteinuria can occur in people of any age. However, some groups of people will be at higher risk of getting the disease than others. Subjects susceptible to proteinuria include:
Elderly people, over 65 years old; People who have ever had kidney diseases; People with family members with kidney disease or a history of kidney-related diseases; People with diabetes affect the kidneys; People with systemic diseases and kidney damage (lupus erythematosus); Patients with Hypertension…
subsection_title: dam nieu.json. Who often suffers from proteinuria?
